reviews.review: Un juego que para mi no pasa de moda una historia buena accion y de mas lo recomiendo en su totalidad.

EDIT: I never finished the game so take that as you will

Que decir... conoci Bioshock gracias a la salida de bioshock 2, creia en su potencial filosofico en ese entonces, nunca jugue el 1 y solo tenia de precedente la filosofia y narrativa que construy√≥ el 2, pero lo que hizo a nivel narrativo Infinite es algo fuera de serie... nunca crei que un juego me haria pasar minutos solo parado, admirando el paisaje y no es que el juego carezca de cosas interesantes por hacer como para que prefiera estar parado admirando el apartado artisitico; Bioshock infinite se vale de una construccion del mundo propio para entender su historia, ignorar las esculturas, la arquitectura y los dialogos de los NPC es perderte de una parte vital en la historia del juego.
Soy un jugador que disfruta mucho los RPG y todo lo que implican en cuestion de historias que contar, y aun asi considero a Infinite superior a algunos de este genero al construir un mundo y una historia por contar. 

Ignoren mi cantidad de tiempo de juego, la mayor parte del tiempo que paso jugando es en el modo off line

A pretty decent game, I liked that the decisions that you make have an impact.  Most of all, I like the moments of realization at the end of the game.  I think playing through a second time, with the knowledge that I have now, would make for a different story entirely.  I miss Rapture, but for what it is, this is a pretty good game.

Overall a well made an executed game......but it had the potential to be better. Not as bad as BS 2 but definitly not as good as BS 1. The overall story could have been much more involved, the developers could have added in much more intrecate story arcs and could have strayed away from the linear story even by a little bit

Amazing game, this is a totally CLASSIC!

You are a guy named ''Booker Dewit''. Also, you are in debt and someone comes to you with an offer: ''Bring us the girl and wipe away the debt.''. I'm not gonna talk about the details of the story, because everyone must play this game and see the story with their own eyes.

The only thing that I dislike is; it was hard to find the weapon that I like to use. You can buy a clip to any weapon, but you can't take or buy the weapon itself from the ''machines''. When I run low on a bullet with any weapon, the game literally forces you to grab up the weapon that is on the ground. Otherwise, you will probably be going to die. That's why I switched difficulty mode hard to medium after half of the game.

I totally recommend this game though. You must add this masterpiece to your should-play list.
